Parameters.Name: Audio Output Configuration – Get Audio Output Configuration Options

Test.TestName: Audio Output Configuration – Get Audio Output Configuration Options
Test.Name: Correct response - there is profile with AOC
Test.Description: Several Audio Outputs, Profile with AudioOutput exist.

Test.TestName: Audio Output Configuration – Get Audio Output Configuration Options
Test.Name: Correct response - Max=Min, one audio output

Test.TestName: Audio Output Configuration – Get Audio Output Configuration Options
Test.Name: Correct response - there is profile with AOC, not the first
Test.Description: Several Audio Outputs, Profile with AudioOutput exist, but not the first in the list.

Test.TestName: Audio Output Configuration – Get Audio Output Configuration Options
Test.Name: Correct response - profile creation

Test.TestName: Audio Output Configuration – Get Audio Output Configuration Options
Test.Name: Wrong response - HelperConfigureMediaProfileWithAudioOutput: empty AOC list
Test.Description: If audioOutputConfigurationList is empty, FAIL the test and skip other steps.

Test.TestName: Audio Output Configuration – Get Audio Output Configuration Options
Test.Name: Wrong response - HelperConfigureMediaProfileWithAudioOutput: empty profile list
Test.Description: If audioOutputConfigurationList is empty, FAIL the test and skip other steps.

Test.TestName: Audio Output Configuration – Get Audio Output Configuration Options
Test.Name: Wrong response - empty AOC list
Test.Description: If audioOutputConfigurationList is empty, FAIL the test and skip other steps.

Test.TestName: Audio Output Configuration – Get Audio Output Configuration Options
Test.Name: Wrong response - Min>Max
Test.Description: If Options.OutputLevelRange.Min > Options.OutputLevelRange.Max FAIL the test and skip other steps.
